overview_of_class: This course offers a broad overview of a range of issues and sociological ways of thinking. Issues may include: interrelations of society, culture, and personality; major social institutions and processes.
name: Topics in Sociology
title: DOHA SOCIOL 242-0-70 Topics in Sociology
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: NUQ: Seats are reserved for Sophomore and Freshmen only.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course offers a broad overview of a range of issues and sociological ways of thinking. Issues may include: interrelations of society, culture, and personality; major social institutions and processes.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: None

  • Open to freshmen and sophomores

  • Open for cross-registration

subject: SOCIOL
